title: Pokemon GBC/GB/GBA ROM pack 2 ALL ROMS+Emulators
description:

*****

Pokemon Blue

Emulators
*********
TGB Dual 7:
this emulator supports the link function on one PC!! so you can trade the pokemon
it also supports internet play as well BUT it only runs Game boy games not gameboy advance.

VBA: (visual boy advance)
this the best if not THE best GBAGB emulator around it supports both file types (GBGBA)
and has a costomisable color pallet and many other functions

VBA-CE:
are faster version of vba.
new icon and menu.

VBA link:
just vba with link support.


also the save files are compatible with each other (use one to link and the other to play)



EXTRAS
******
WinRAR to open 7z files
hacked versions of the GB Roms
other language versions of the GB roms
